# Data Science, GIS & Business Analytics Consulting 

39 North Labs, LLC. is a boutique consulting firm offering a range of [professional services](/services.qmd) in the field of data analytics and informatics, with a focus on public sector datasets and an advanced GIS & mapping capability.


We also publish several [open-source software](/open-source.qmd) libraries to elevate the state of the art in analytics.

Contact us today for assistance with:

- Public records access and government data mining
- GIS and spatial intelligence
- GIS programming and mapping application development
